metadata.description: Massive comprehensive European city database with 280+ cities across 7 countries, optimized for authentic travel experiences and comprehensive European coverage
metadata.focus_corridor: Complete European coverage from Atlantic to Mediterranean, Atlantic to Alpine regions
metadata.data_quality: Hand-curated with local insights, authentic travel appeal, and comprehensive regional coverage
metadata.coverage: Comprehensive European coverage including France (major regions: Île-de-France, Rhône-Alpes, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, Occitanie, Normandie, Bretagne, Centre-Val de Loire, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, Grand Est), Italy (Liguria, Tuscany, Emilia-Romagna, Veneto, Piemonte, Lombardia, Campania, Sicilia), Spain (Catalonia, Andalusia, Valencia, Basque Country), Germany (Bavaria, Baden-Württemberg, North Rhine-Westphalia), Switzerland (Alpine regions), Austria (Imperial and Alpine regions), Netherlands (Canal cities and cultural centers)
